about_the_game:
Oasis the Great is an online multi-player physics based sandbox game that have infinite possibilities.

(≖ᴗ≖)✧ Yes! we combine the popular and great mechanics into this tremendous oasis.

huge world for you to explore!

  • the oasis is full off various place in different art style. lowpoly ,fantasy or realistic.From ancient culture temple to futuristic city

Physics based mechanics!

  • what could be more interesting and more possibilities for you to trigger when you have a physics based character? not to mention it in online co-op .your little human can climb, trot, grab , hold a weapon with one hand,punch ,fly kick,head knock. and there will be First Person View mode for you to interact with stuff more accurately (finally dont have to grab things only in Third Person View mode(✪ω✪))

Up to 20 players PVP and PVE

  • you can form a crew and go loot something,or start the gang fight with other players

farming and survival

  • if you want to,you can grow some crops,use ur imagination to harvest more efficiently, stick your sickle on a vehicle and you know the rest(￣▽￣)／
    also the survival mode can be turn on anytime you want

owning property and rebuild anywhere you like

  • when you r rich you could purchase your favorite property and rebulid it anywhere you like .on a mountain with a beautiful view in front of u or even the roof of a Skyscraper, as long as the "cop" player wont give you a ticket.

watch online Videos or films with your fellows

  • what if you want to watch a horror video and you are very scared of it? just invite your fellows and watch it together! if he spoil the ending you could punish him physically in game

customization!!

  • you can customize your face with anything you can type ,well, we do recommend you use some lovely and emotionally understanding symbol.
    also you can customize your vehicle or furniture with your favourite pictures on your disk.

Mini games!

  • invite your mates or other players and play the mini games together. tanks,party fight, disco ,spaceship fight in the sky,solve puzzles in escape room, find the secret in the ghost land

content_descriptors.notes: shooting with bullet , fighting ，slight sexual hint

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows 7 sp1
  • Processor: intel or AMD 2.8ghz 4 core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX660ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: intel or AMD 3.6ghz quad core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1060 or AMD RX580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
